text.Prompt:
Generate an exciting product description that includes the product title and features in one paragraph of 6-8 sentences.

Product title:
SPRINGROSE 90 x 132 Inch Commercial Grade Heavy Duty Black Polyester Rectangle Tablecloths (Pack of 10)

Product features:
-Polyester
-Dimensions: 90” x 132” rectangle
-Pack of 10
-Color: Black
-Machine washable
-Great For weddings, banquets, anniversary parties, receptions, etc.
text.Response A: Ooh, ooh! Do you need a special tablecloth for your party? Look no further! Our SPRINGROSE 90 x 132 Inch Commercial Grade Heavy Duty Black Polyester Rectangle Tablecloths are perfect for weddings, banquets, anniversary parties, receptions, and more! They're made of super-strong polyester that can withstand lots of uses. Each pack has 10 tablecloths, so you'll have plenty for all your guests. And the best part? They're easy to wash in a machine! So, get ready to party with our awesome tablecloths! 🎉🎉🎉
text.Response B:
Made from 100-percent polyester, these heavy-duty tablecloths are machine washable and durable enough to last for years. Measuring 90 inches in length by 132 inches in width, these rectangular tablecloths are the perfect size for most standard-sized tables. Each tablecloth is black in color and is sold in packs of 10. Use them at your next event to create a chic, sophisticated table setting.

These polyester tablecloths are durable, machine washable, and stain-resistant. They are the perfect choice for weddings, banquets, anniversary parties, receptions, and more.

The color is black and the size is 90" x 132". It is a pack of 10 and is made of 100-percent polyester.

meta.preamble_a: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
meta.preamble_b: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
